params.name: lengths
params.description: The valid length of every sequence, a tensor with shape [batch_size]

params.name: predictions
params.description: The predictions index, a tensor with shape [batch_size, sequence_length].

params.name: labels
params.description: The labels index, a tensor with shape [batch_size, sequence_length].

params.name: dummy
params.description: Unnecessary parameter for compatibility with older versions with parameters list inputs, lengths, predictions, labels. Defaults to None.

return.description: Returns tuple (num_infer_chunks, num_label_chunks, num_correct_chunks).With the fields:num_infer_chunks (Tensor):The number of the inference chunks.num_label_chunks (Tensor):The number of the label chunks.num_correct_chunks (Tensor):The number of the correct chunks.Returns tuple (num_infer_chunks, num_label_chunks, num_correct_chunks).With the fields:The number of the inference chunks.The number of the label chunks.The number of the correct chunks.
